mapper.select: select s.* from sys_permission s where s.permission_state=1

select sp.* from sys_permission sp inner join sys_role_permission srp on sp.permission_id = srp.permission_id inner join sys_role sr on sr.role_id =srp.role_id where sr.role_id = #{roleId} and sp.permission_state = 1 and role_status = 0
